tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The experience with the doctor was very good but the hospital staffs dont know how to behave. I will suggest not to visit people's tree hospital anyone. First they took 650 for registration thn for the 2nd time when i visited to consult doctor they have charged 600 again. Then what is the use of registration, thn the hospital staff charged extra money for injecting. ******** ** ***** **** ** **** ******** **** *** ** ******* ***** *** **** ** ** **** ****** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Saikiran for me is a doc with the midas touch!! Whatever he has been prescribing for my diabetes has worked. 

A doc who has the patience to listen to you & also the ability to explain the nuances of the treatment in layman's terms.

He is also receptive to small talk other than the  job at hand after you complete your consultation.

Wishing him all the best in all his endeavours.

Arun

review: Dr Saikiran S. is a down to earth person and very very soft spoken and friendly. The moment I spoke to him I felt at ease and at home and replied all his queries spontaneously. He gave me all assurances and made me physically and mentally strong and also made me quite relaxed. Your Hospital is blessed to get a Doctor like him. Thank you very much once again Dr. Saikiran.

I would recommend this hospital since they have got good experienced doctors
